name: ttf2woff2
description: Convert TTF files to WOFF2 ones.

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- tests/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.emcc: miniquery -p "targets.#.sources.#" ./binding.gyp | grep -v "csrc/addon.cc" | xargs emcc --bind -o jssrc/ttf2woff2.js -O3 --memory-init-file 0 -s "TOTAL_MEMORY=536870912" -s "ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1" --post-js jssrc/post.js csrc/fallback.cc
scripts.emcc-debug: miniquery -p "targets.#.sources.#" ./binding.gyp | grep -v "csrc/addon.cc" | xargs emcc --bind -o jssrc/ttf2woff2.js -s "ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1" -s "ASSERTIONS=1" --post-js jssrc/post.js csrc/fallback.cc

author: Nicolas Froidure
